Summary: 6-10 orange lights in a staircase pattern hovering in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving my car west to the local grocery store I noticed 6-10 orange lights that were larger than stars forming a staircase pattern going up from left to right in the western sky. I immediately assumed it was "Chinese lanterns" and traveled to my destination. In less than 10 min I headed back to my house and attempted to locate the objects again. They were gone. There were no trace of them anywhere. The lights did not flicker and I have found similar formations on the internet that looked very similar to what I saw.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around October 8th 2012
